alert.note: Alert for Atoka; Bryan; Carter; Coal; Johnston; Love; Marshall; Murray (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 8:31PM CDT until May 15 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR JOHNSTON...NORTHWESTERN BRYAN...NORTHEASTERN LOVE...SOUTHERN COAL...SOUTHEASTERN CARTER...MARSHALL...ATOKA AND SOUTHERN MURRAY COUNTIES... At 831 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Lane to 4 miles southeast of Caddo to near Silo to near Madill to near Lake Murray to near Lone Grove, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Durant, Madill, Atoka, Tishomingo, Coalgate, Lone Grove, Kingston, Dickson, Caddo, Mannsville, Springer, Bokchito, Ravia, Wapanucka, Stringtown, Lehigh, Bennington, Silo and Mill Creek. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Atoka; Bryan; Carter; Coal; Johnston; Love; Marshall; Murray
